name: Can You Dig It?
body:
### Background.
One of my favorite games of all time is Dig Dug.  When I was a young child, my mother would give me a handful of quarters to pacify me while she did the grocery shopping at the local Kroger - Savon.  I still have fond memories of that beautiful arcade machine located next to the carpet shampoo machines for rent kiosk.
I have no experience with programming, but I'm eager - that must account for something; right?
### Obstacles
I believe Namco has a pretty significant IP patent on this game, so a big challenge will be creating something that gives the "feel" of the original game without infringing on Namco's original design.
### Programming Languages to Consider
I'm intrigued by the possibility of using the Unreal Engine, Swift, Android, etc. because they're all open source.  I really want to create a mobile application/game, since I believe this is one of the fastest growing segments of mobile apps./gaming industry.
### Authors and Contributors
Grover Peters @3Grover3 is the lone wolf/author/contributor for this project.  However, I will definitely need to partner with other more talented individuals in order to get this to market before the end of the world as we know it.
### Closing
If you have any feedback or suggestions, I would love to hear from you.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
